title: Xayah nerfs
body: Where in the flying heck are the nerfs to this cancer champion? Literally the marksman version of {{champion:157}} in terms of cancer.

> +Bledded1990 Vayne is I think more similar to the master yi of bot lane. Weak early, awesome late. Unstoppable if ahead.

I wouldn't exactly call Vayne weak early when top lane Vayne is a very viable playstyle that sees a decent amount of play in high elo in every region.

The only thing I don't like about Xayah is that people are winning with her through pure auto attacks more than her actual abilities, and considering she looks to be designed as an ability based champion(Think MF/Ezreal) it's a little frustrating. When Xayah is building IE in more games than she is ER, it's a little concerning. When I played Xayah top lane(when she didn't have that silly lockout on Q+autos), my autos would hurt but they wouldn't do 1/3 of someone's HP, but with the right setup of my skills and placement I could still deal tons of damage to them. Now when you're running back from a Xayah you're not actually using her weakness to your advantage because her autos while following you hurt more than her combo.
